name: DischargeFromInpatientFacility
title: Discharge from Inpatient Facility
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Inpatient discharge - hospital and rehabilitation),(Data Element Scope: Grouping value set of CPT and SNOMED CT.  Can be used to inform MSSP ACO CARE-1.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT and SNOMED CT Inpatient discharge - hospital and rehabilitation),(Exclusion Criteria: Not observation, admission, and stay codes.)

contains.display: Final inpatient visit with instructions at discharge (procedure)
Hospital inpatient or observation discharge day management; 30 minutes or less on the date of the encounter
Hospital inpatient or observation discharge day management; more than 30 minutes on the date of the encounter
Nursing facility discharge management; 30 minutes or less total time on the date of the encounter
Nursing facility discharge management; more than 30 minutes total time on the date of the encounter
